name: Humand
headline: All-in-one app for internal communication and HR
description:
Humand transforms how companies digitize their internal communication, culture, and HR processes within one user-friendly app. As a result, Humand provides every company with a digital Community to centralize every company-employee interaction.

Humand's digital Communities are powerful, customizable and easily adapt to the needs of every company, no matter the industry, size or region. Companies that implement Humand benefit from the following suite of Mini Apps, which are getting smarter thanks to the power of AI:

+ Forms & Smart Workflows 📋
+ Internal Social Network ❤️
+ Chat 💬
+ Time Off 🏝
+ Magazine 📰
+ Surveys 📊
+ Smart Intranet 📲
+ Kudos 👏🏻
+ Learning 📚
+ Onboarding 🎉
+ Org chart 👥
+ Company Files and Employee Documents 📂
+ Perks & Benefits 🥂
+ Birthdays & Work Anniversaries 🥳
+ Employee Development 🥇
+ Electronic Signature ✍🏻
+ Smart Tickets 📧
+ Marketplace 🛍
+ Calendar & Events 📆
+ Agenda 🔎
+ Integrations 🔗

More than 400 companies use Humand. Implemented by ArcelorMittal (biggest steel producer in the world), Tenaris (global leader in steel pipes production), NSG group (among the biggest glass producers in the world), and many other organizations across different countries.

Humand enables all workers, particularly those without direct access to a computer at their desks, to stay connected with their company anywhere, anytime. Humand enhances internal communication speed, streamline information flow between collaborators, and enable instant, targeted reach to all employees with push notifications tailored to their needs.

Companies that adopt a digital Community powered by Humand experience an enriched work environment, heightened employee camaraderie, and a surge in productivity, all contributing to a thriving and connected workforce.

Humand initially emerged as a solution to help companies digitize their internal communication, culture, and HR functions. The result? A comprehensive digital Community that centralizes every interaction between the organization and its employees—making engagement simple and effective.

At the core of Humand’s functionality lies an innovative suite of Mini Apps. Each is designed to adapt to the specific needs of companies, regardless of their industry or size. - **Forms & Smart Workflows** for streamlined processes.
- An **Internal Social Network** to foster community and connection.
- **Chat** for real-time communication.
- **Time Off** management for work-life balance.
- **Surveys** and **Feedback** tools to gauge employee sentiment.
- A **Smart Intranet** and **Company Files** for seamless information sharing.
- **Onboarding** tools to help new employees hit the ground running.
- Customizable **Kudos** and **Employee Development** features to celebrate achievements and advance skills.

Humand empowers all employees, especially those without constant computer access, allowing them to stay informed and engaged from anywhere and at any time. Through push notifications and targeted information delivery, communication is faster and more effective.

### The Impact

Companies adopting Humand have noted a significant enhancement in their internal communication speeds, a smoother information flow, and increased productivity. This leads to an enriched work environment where camaraderie thrives, ultimately fostering a connected workforce—a crucial element in today’s remote and hybrid work setups.

### Conclusion

In a landscape where digital interaction is crucial, Humand stands out as an all-in-one solution that not only simplifies HR processes but also builds a engaged community. As it continues to evolve, this platform promises to change how companies connect with their employees, making the workplace experience richer and more fulfilling.

To learn more about how Humand can transform your organization, visit their website at [humand.co](https://humand.co).
